addr: 6448 Santa Monica Blvd Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: Agent/Manager Scene Night - Industry Guests Welcome
desc: Looking for new talent to represent before the upcoming TV Pilot Season? Trying to find the right cast for upcoming projects? Interested to see the work of a talented group of actors - on camera, the way you're used to seeing it? ? We are holding another scene night for industry guests - as a chance to check out a select group of actors - on camera. ?We invite any agents, managers, casting directors, producers, directors, or other entertainment professionals to join us, and have a chance to view the actors' work. There will be scenes or monologues performed - all LIVE and all ON CAMERA! Our focus for this Scene Night is both agents and managers. ?We'll have a panel of four reps from the following companies, providing feedback for the actors: Come check out the great work our clients will be performing! ?More than a showcase - it's a firsthand demonstration of acting talent on camera, in a way that you can really see what it is these actors have to offer. For more information about this event and our institute, please go to our website at  http://www.studiocartists.com . DIRECTIONS: Our studio is located on Santa Monica Blvd., between Cole & Wilcox, along Theatre Row in the heart of Hollywood. PARKING: Street parking is available all around the school and in the adjoining neighborhood.
